languages.text: В кровавых метках, оставленных культом, сокрыты строки Песни о дороге из кровавых следов, посвященной стезе Матери-паучихи. Лорд-капитан решил{mf||а} проследовать за кровавыми символами и посмотреть, куда они приведут.

The blood marks left by the cultists conceal the verses of the Song of Trailing Blood, which chronicles the path walked by the Matriarch Spider. The Lord Captain has decided to follow the symbols and see where they lead.
languages.original_text: В кровавых метках, оставленных культом, сокрыты строки Песни о дороге из кровавых следов, посвященной стезе Матери-паучихи. Лорд-капитан решил{mf||а} проследовать за кровавыми символами и посмотреть, куда они приведут.

traits.locale_text: The blood marks left by the cultists conceal the lines of Ei'dehelim, otherwise known as the Song of Trailing Blood, which tells of the path walked by the Founder of the Weave. The Lord Captain has decided to follow the symbols and see where they lead.

The blood marks left by the cultists conceal the lines of Ei'dehelim, otherwise known as the Song of Trailing Blood, which tells of the path walked by the Founder of the Weave. The Lord Captain has decided to follow the symbols and see where they lead.

The blood marks left by the cultists conceal the verses of the Song of Trailing Blood, which chronicles the path walked by the Matriarch Spider. The Lord Captain has decided to follow the symbols and see where they lead.

The blood marks left by the cultists conceal the verses of the Song of Trailing Blood, which chronicles the path walked by the Matriarch Spider. The Lord Captain has decided to follow the symbols and see where they lead.

languages.text: Les traces sanglantes laissées par les cultistes masquent en vérité les versets du Chant de la piste de sang, véritable chronique retraçant le chemin parcouru par l'araignée matriarche. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a décidé de suivre les symboles pour voir où ils mènent.
languages.original_text: The blood marks left by the cultists conceal the verses of the Song of Trailing Blood, which chronicles the path walked by the Matriarch Spider. The Lord Captain has decided to follow the symbols and see where they lead.

traits.locale_text: Les traces sanglantes laissées par les cultistes masquent en vérité les versets du Chant de la piste de sang, véritable chronique retraçant le chemin parcouru par l'araignée matriarche. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a décidé de suivre les symboles pour voir où ils mènent.

languages.text: Los rastros de sangre dejados por los cultistas ocultan los versos de la Canción del Rastro de Sangre, que resume el camino de la Araña Matriarca. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha decidido seguir los símbolos para ver dónde llevan.
languages.original_text: The blood marks left by the cultists conceal the verses of the Song of Trailing Blood, which chronicles the path walked by the Matriarch Spider. The Lord Captain has decided to follow the symbols and see where they lead.

traits.locale_text: Los rastros de sangre dejados por los cultistas ocultan los versos de la Canción del Rastro de Sangre, que resume el camino de la Araña Matriarca. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha decidido seguir los símbolos para ver dónde llevan.

languages.text: カルト信者たちが残した血痕には、蜘蛛の師母が歩んだ道を記した「滴る血の歌」の一節が隠されていた。ロード・キャプテンはシンボルを辿り、その行方を確かめることにした。
languages.original_text: The blood marks left by the cultists conceal the verses of the Song of Trailing Blood, which chronicles the path walked by the Matriarch Spider. The Lord Captain has decided to follow the symbols and see where they lead.

traits.locale_text: カルト信者たちが残した血痕には、蜘蛛の師母が歩んだ道を記した「滴る血の歌」の一節が隠されていた。ロード・キャプテンはシンボルを辿り、その行方を確かめることにした。

languages.text: 拜死教教徒留下的血迹掩盖了《血路之歌》的歌词。这首歌记录了最初的女族长曾走过的道路。行商浪人决定跟随这条道路前进，看看这条道路最终会通往何处。
languages.original_text: The blood marks left by the cultists conceal the verses of the Song of Trailing Blood, which chronicles the path walked by the Matriarch Spider. The Lord Captain has decided to follow the symbols and see where they lead.

traits.locale_text: 拜死教教徒留下的血迹掩盖了《血路之歌》的歌词。这首歌记录了最初的女族长曾走过的道路。行商浪人决定跟随这条道路前进，看看这条道路最终会通往何处。

languages.text: Die von den Kultisten hinterlassenen Blutzeichen verbergen die Verse des Liedes von der Blutspur, das den Weg beschreibt, den die Matriarchenspinne beschritten hat. Der Lord Captain hat beschlossen, den Symbolen zu folgen, um herauszufinden, wohin sie führen.
languages.original_text: The blood marks left by the cultists conceal the verses of the Song of Trailing Blood, which chronicles the path walked by the Matriarch Spider. The Lord Captain has decided to follow the symbols and see where they lead.

traits.locale_text: Die von den Kultisten hinterlassenen Blutzeichen verbergen die Verse des Liedes von der Blutspur, das den Weg beschreibt, den die Matriarchenspinne beschritten hat. Der Lord Captain hat beschlossen, den Symbolen zu folgen, um herauszufinden, wohin sie führen.

languages.text: Tarikatçılar tarafından bırakılan kanlı izler, Örümcek Kraliçe'nin yürüdüğü yollardan bahseden Kan İzi Ezgisi'nin mısralarını gizliyor. Lord Kaptan sembolleri takip etmeye ve nereye gittiklerini görmeye karar verdi.
languages.original_text: The blood marks left by the cultists conceal the verses of the Song of Trailing Blood, which chronicles the path walked by the Matriarch Spider. The Lord Captain has decided to follow the symbols and see where they lead.
